sentences.sContent: The shops can offer you a big choice of hosiery, stockings and pantyhose, reaching from basics to the “Sex And The City” look.
sentences.sContent_eng: The shops can offer you a big choice of hosiery, stockings and pantyhose, reaching from basics to the “Sex And The City” look.
sentences.sCn: 商场里能为你提供针织品、长袜、裤袜等多种选择，从基本式样到“欲望城市”式的搭配都有。

trans.tranOther: a general word for  tights  ,  stockings  , or socks, used in shops and in the clothing industry
